text: Modern Russia (the Russian Federation) has many symbols. Some of these symbols have ancient origins. Some from the Tsarist era. Some from the Soviet Union. ==Emblems and symbols== *Coat of arms of Russia *The Soviet Union *Double- headed eagle *Flag of Russia *Flag of Soviet Union *Victory Banner *Hammer and sickle. *Motherland, Mother Russia *Red star *Russian Bear *National anthem of Russia, State Anthem of the Soviet Union *Cultural icons of Russia
title: National symbols of Russia
